long_description:
As we start the new year, the time has come to finally bring that idea into fruition, strike that deal or finalize that merger. When the bar is set high, you need a place that emanates power, sophistication and intellect - in fewer words, when lunch hour hits, put your computer to sleep and head to Royalton New York.

 

Seasoned corporate travelers coming to Manhattan know that the Royalton New York offers the best of a Midtown boutique hotel without the cold, hotel chain feel, but with plenty of luxury and comfort. If you think that only guests are our beneficiaries, think again! Those lucky enough to join the daily grind near 44th St West, the Forty Four Restaurant will inevitably become their hidden lunch hour spot.

 

Power Lunch at the Royalton New York

In the spirit of innovation, our chefs have worked tirelessly to prepare a brand new a la carte lunch menu suited for the everyday flow of New York’s innovators and elite with an insatiable appetite for success and good food.

 

Monday to Friday, from 12pm to 2pm (reservations are recommended), Forty Four is where you want to be to conduct business and share a delectable meal with your colleagues. Built to seat approximately 70 people, our restaurant offers an intimate atmosphere perfect for professionals looking for a meal that surpasses the average desk sandwich that many chew in front of their computers.

 

For a Quick Lunch Break

Are you so tied-up that you have little time to spare? Worry not - our new menu includes soups, salads, sandwiches (NOT desk sandwiches), entrees, flatbread, toasts and desserts - all made to be served quickly and leave you energized to continue your day. If, however, you’re after a good-ol’ long lunch, we can accommodate business meetings and lunches for small and large parties.

 

For Business Lunch Meetings

Do you want to impress a client with a restaurant off-the-beaten-path? Wait to see their faces when they cross our lobby and catch sight of our 20-foot fireplace or the dark corridors that bring back the age-old New York glamour that is so hard to find these days. Anyone who’s a fan of Mad-Men will feel their inner Don Draper stir, while others will see themselves on the covers of Wired.

 

Anything can happen at the Royalton New York, where new ideas are born, bred and unleashed. And when you make it big and give interviews on how-you-came-up-with-the-next-big-thing, kindly mention that it all began at Forty Four. Contact us to book your table!
